subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick passed Denny Hamlin with 11 laps to go, then held on to win the Carfax 400 at Michigan International Speedway.
snippet: Kevin Harvick passed Denny Hamlin with 11 laps to go, then held on to win the Carfax 400 at Michigan International Speedway.
